name: Digital Transformation Advisors
short_description: Lightweight performance laptop for study & office work.
long_description: Powered by Intel Core i5 12th Gen processor, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 14-inch FHD display, and aluminum body. Best for students, office work, and multitasking.

name: Digital Transformation Advisors
short_description: Crystal clear audio with noise cancellation.
long_description: Bluetooth 5.3, ENC noise cancellation, 40-hour battery backup, deep bass, dual mic support, and ultra-comfort cushion design.

name: Digital Transformation Advisors
short_description: Outemu Blue switches with RGB backlight.
long_description: Durable mechanical keys, 50 million keystroke lifespan, RGB lighting presets, anti-ghosting support. Great for gamers and typists.

name: Digital Transformation Advisors
short_description: Perfect for online class, video calls & streaming.
long_description: 1080p wide-angle lens, noise-reduction microphone, USB plug-and-play support. Works with Zoom, Google Meet, OBS.

name: Laptop Cooling Pad 5-Fan RGB
short_description: Stand out from the crowd with a professional portfolio
long_description: 5 powerful fans, adjustable height, USB-powered, RGB lighting, supports 14–17 inch laptops. Best for gaming and long work sessions.

name: Portable SSD 1TB USB-C
short_description: Elevate your brand with a the stunning portfolio
long_description: 1TB NVMe external SSD, read speed up to 1050MB/s, shockproof body, USB-C/USB-A compatible. Ideal for video editors & photographers.

name: Gaming Mouse 7200 DPI RGB
short_description: Elevate your brand with a the stunning portfolio
long_description: Ergonomic design, 7 programmable buttons, DPI range 1200–7200, RGB strips, perfect for FPS and MOBA gamers.

name: Mini Desktop PC (Ryzen 5 5600U)
short_description: Compact mini PC for home office & media use.
long_description: Ryzen 5 5600U CPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, triple display support (HDMI+DP+Type-C).
